snippet: Readers discuss the conditions in Central America that drive immigration and the Obama administration’s policies.
abstract: Letter from Rep Bob Goodlatte of Virginia responds to June 4 article and June 5 editorial on wave of unaccompanied minors immigrating to the United States from Central America.
lead_paragraph: Readers discuss the conditions in Central America that drive immigration and the Obama administration’s policies.
